properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yumo humu mwokozi yesu,
kwenye mzabibu na ngano tamu,
ni mpole ni mwema ni uzima.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Wau,
(waumini, simameni, pole pole,
kwa maringo, jongeeni karamuni,
mpate, mpate,
kumwonja mwokozi Yesu.) x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ekaristi ni jina lake,
pamoja naye mungu mwenyewe,
ndani yetu nasi ndani yake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alitoa jioni
ile kwa kumbukubu,
yake milele
tule tunywe wote tuokoke.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tugeuze maisha yetu
yakafananae na meza hii
huruma upendo msamaha.
